variables.name: S3_ACCESS_KEY
variables.desc: Access key for the S3 storage.

variables.name: S3_SECRET_KEY
variables.desc: Secret Key for the S3 storage.

variables.name: S3_BUCKET_NAME
variables.desc: The name of the S3 bucket.

variables.name: ZIP_FOLDERS
variables.desc: Whether or not to compress folders and upload them as a single ZIP file.

variables.name: FILE_SRC
variables.desc: File source under container volume mount.

variables.name: DESTINATION_FOLDER
variables.desc: File destination folder under s3 bucket

variables.name: FOLDER_ADD_TIMESTAMP
variables.desc: Whether or not to add a timestamp to the filename

variables.name: FOLDER_TIMESTAMP_POSITION
variables.desc: Whether to add the timestamp as 'prefix' or a 'suffix'
